definition: A person who occupies a residential space or property under a legal agreement, typically paying rent to the owner or landlord. This term is commonly used to refer to a female individual fulfilling the role of a tenant.

examples.german: Die Mieterin hat die Miete pünktlich bezahlt.
examples.english: The tenant paid the rent on time.

examples.german: Die Mieterin beschwerte sich über den Lärm.
examples.english: The tenant complained about the noise.

examples.german: Die Mieterin hat den Mietvertrag unterschrieben.
examples.english: The tenant signed the lease agreement.
The tenant lives on the ground floor.

examples.german: Die Mieterin hat die Wohnung renoviert.
